memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int detIndex, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: Dexela

briefdescription.para: Constructor for Dexela driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
detIndex
The detector index in system (0=first detector, etc.)
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, DEX_AcquireOffset, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks.
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynEnum->read().

detaileddescription.para:
Sets the enum values and strings for DEX_BinningMode, DEX_FullWellMode, and ADTriggerMode
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
strings
Array of string pointers.
values
Array of values
severities
Array of severities
nElements
Size of value array
nIn
Number of elements actually returned

Prints details about the detector in us if details>0. Prints information about all local and network detectors if details>1. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
Controls the level of detail in the report.

inbodydescription.para: Correct for detector offset and gain as necessary
Correct for dead pixels as necessary

briefdescription.para: Destructor for Dexela driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para: Frees all resources and calls Acquisition_Close()

briefdescription.para: Report information about all local and network Dexela detectors.

inbodydescription.para: Acquire Modes Single: use Snap(), internal software trigger (disable Pulse Gen) Multiple: use Live View, internal software trigger (disable Pulse Gen) Continuous: use Live View, ExpTime PV for exposure, Pulse Gen for image rate

briefdescription.para: Driver for the Perkin Elmer Dexela CMOS flat panel detectors.
